#summary How to to install the executable-war-addon with Roo 1.1.x shell

===How to install executable-war-addon Spring Roo Addon===

 * Uninstall the older addon versions
{{{
  roo> osgi uninstall --bundleSymbolicName net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon
}}}
 * Install the addon directly from the googlecode site
{{{ 
  roo> felix shell start http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon-0.1.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT.jar
}}}
  Alternatively you can download the [http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon-0.1.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT.jar executable.war.roo.addon] and install it from your local folder:
{{{
  roo> felix shell start file:/<absolute path>/net.tzolov.jetty.executable.war.roo.addon-0.1.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT.jar
}}}
 * Verify the installation:
{{{
  roo> osgi ps 
}}}
 * You should see something like:
{{{
...
[  60] [Active     ] [    1] net-tzolov-jetty-executable-war-roo-addon (0.1.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT)
}}}
 * From the Roo Shell type *help* to see the list of all supported commands. The following line should appear amongst others entries:
{{{
...
executable war setup - Creates an <XXX>-EXECWAR.war executable application. Usage: java -jar <XXX>-EXECWAR.war
}}}
